title: UNP QUESTIONS GOVT’S RESPONSE IF LLRC IS REJECTED BY INTERNATIONAL COMMUNITY
content: The government needs to explain what action it will take, if the international community rejects the Lessons Learnt and Reconciliation Commission (LLRC), says Lakshman Kiriella, UNP MP. At a media briefing held yesterday the United National Party commented on the powers vested in the LLRC….
